section.name: Intro
section.p: This document describes the configuration file used by mod_jk2 on the Tomcat site. Its default name is ${jkHome}/conf/jk2.properties, where ${jkHome} is the well known ${catalina.base} property.

tr.td: Define the class of the handler myhandler.
Location of the jkjni dynamic library. It is searched in java.library.path but a absolute path can be specified.
If set to "inprocess" the jk2 will regiter native library functions by itself. If not then it has to be the absolute path of the jkjni dynamic library.
